comment: /**  * Handle a failed {@link Throwable}.  *  * @param failure the cause of failure  * @throws IOException if the sink should fail on this failure, the implementation should rethrow the throwable or a custom one  */
code: /**  * Handle a failed {@link Throwable}.  *  * @param failure the cause of failure  * @throws IOException if the sink should fail on this failure, the implementation should rethrow the throwable or a custom one  */ void onFailure(Throwable failure) throws IOException.
